# graph_statistics

**Category:** Utilities

## Description

Calculate comprehensive graph statistics.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description |
|------|------|----------|---------|-------------|
| `graph_id` | `str` | Yes | `-` | ID of the graph |

## Returns

**Type:** `Dict[str, Any]`

Various graph statistics
